feed.title: Homer Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.02.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Snappier container healthchecks by @tanasegabriel in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/856
  • disable cache for Docuseal fetch by @meonkeys in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/866
  • Fix #858 add labels to docker image by @molhamalnasr in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/859
  • Added interval to update status for the *arrs & Tautulli by @mbentley in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/556

New Contributors

  • @tanasegabriel made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/856
  • @molhamalnasr made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/859

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v25.02.1...v25.02.2

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.03.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • fix(quicklinks): Conditional icon rendering by @tanasegabriel in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/878
  • fix(search): Allow usage of the hotkey in the text by @bastienwirtz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/879
  • fix(Dockerfile): ensure VERSION_TAG is correctly passed as a build arâ€¦ by @molhamalnasr in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/ pull/882
  • fix: make sure healthcheck dont use a proxy by @bastienwirtz in 1c09714c438402b5bf1d343585fc88625c7ddb36
  • feat(logs): get lighthttpd accesslog in docker logs by @bastienwirtz in 13fb05696a9a958acd5890dac381c2d4bb494b37
  • fix(cards): Avoid lowercase letters cut off #794 by @bastienwirtz in 20fb0c2254bf53e2df1332afaf68b8a72baf6958
  • fix(navbar): Adjust icon spacing #857 by @bastienwirtz in 4bd449e036a22a725ff7236fc5b1d7e39ee0238c

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v25.02.2...v25.03.1

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.03.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • fix(cards): hide overflow to avoid scroll bars in cards in 11934c3995ecd52e304f9627fc078c95e9780204

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v25.03.1...v25.03.2

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.03.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Add YAML config schema for auto complete support by @cbos in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/883
  • fix(docker): Avoid logging docker healthcheck requests. by @bastienwirtz in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/890

New Contributors

  • @cbos made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/883

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v25.03.2...v25.03.3

entry.title: New release for Homer: v25.04.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Main changes

  • Fix typos in config-schema.json by @mbelangergit in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/894
  • For Portainer Service : add status online/offline and version of the card by @thibaut1304 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/898
  • Add service matrix, view status and version by @thibaut1304 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/899
  • Add service vaultwarden, view status and version by @thibaut1304 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/900
  • add service TruenasScale, view status and version by @thibaut1304 in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/901
  • Add Linkding support by @cbos in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/895

New Contributors

  • @mbelangergit made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/894
  • @thibaut1304 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/pull/898

Full Changelog: https://github.com/bastienwirtz/homer/compare/v25.03.3...v25.04.1
